name: European Federation for Complementary and Alternative Medicine
goal: To gain equality of access to complementary and sustainable healthcare, CAM, for all European citizens, and to gain the formal right to practice and work in CAM for all appropriately trained CAM professionals
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Implementation of the Single Market
Implementation of Employment Rights and Policies
Recognition of Professional Qualifications
Application of the Services Directive
